item.title: Chinese-Linked Attackers Exploit Check Point Flaw to Deploy ShadowPad and Ransomware
item.description: A previously unknown threat group exploited a newly patched vulnerability in Check Point network security products (CVE-2024-24919) to deploy ShadowPad malware and the NailaoLocker ransomware. The attacks primarily targeted European healthcare organizations.
